product_name: Custom Correct Custom Correct Elwha Valley Map
long_description: This topographic trail map to the Elwha Valley of Olympic National Park is a highly detailed reference for route finding. Map indicates elevation in feet and road distances in both miles and kilometers; measures 22-1/2 x 14-1/2 inches. Mileage between trail intersections is super-imposed on the map. Scale 1:62,500 or 1 inch to the mile; contour interval is 100 feet.
short_description: This topographic trail map to the Elwha Valley of Olympic National Park is a highly detailed reference for route finding.
